## Soil Health

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(
    pacman::p_load(
        ggplot2,
        janitor,
        dplyr
    )
)

data(iris)
dat <- iris %>%
    clean_names()
dat %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = sepal_length, y = petal_length, color = species)) +
    geom_jitter(
        size = 3,
        alpha = 0.6
    ) +
    theme_classic()
```
